text: Brian Belcher is a Canadian social scientist, currently a Canada Research Chair in Sustainability Research Effectiveness at Royal Roads University. From October through December 2015 he was a Fellow at the Durham University Institute of Advanced Study. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Royal Roads University faculty Category:Canadian sociologists Category:University of Winnipeg alumni Category:University of Manitoba alumni Category:University of Minnesota alumni Category:Fellows of the Institute of Advanced Study (Durham)
title: Brian Belcher
